device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table); Mounted to wall
scale: Near, personal space; Social space; Room
use_cases_desc: multi-user web browsing, polling, and game.
contribution_desc: A middleware that enables interaction with large displays through mobile devices, consisting of a I/O module, translation module, application module, and display module. The paper describes three implemented applications.
use_cases: Interaction with large display; Leisure; Web browsing; polling; game
